description: Stephanie Paige graduated from MIT in 2009 with a B.S. in Biology and a B.S. in Computer Science and Electical Engineering. She joined the Clotho project as lead developer in 2012. Her interests include polyglot (multiple-language) programming systems and empowering researchers of all programming ability levels to customize or develop high-quality tools that accelerate their research.
name: Stephanie Paige
title: Lead Developer
